page.title: 17EVENTS AT SCHOOL
page.content: At Christmas we have a party.Father Christmas gives all the children a present.We also have a Hallowe'en party.We bake cakes and biscuits and duck for apples.We have a fancy-dress competition, sing songs and dance. Primary VII spent a week at the Ballater outdoor centre on a field course and environmental project.Some children go for a week's ski-ing instruction.In summer we go on hill-walks.We have various educational outings connected with project work.We often have concerts.We had one for the senior citizens when we sang and recited poetry learned for the annual Burns competition.In summer we enter the inter-school sports and compete in football, netball and badminton matches.
